alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Strafford; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 3:12AM EST until February 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SNOWSTORM ARRIVES ON FRIDAY... .Low pressure will track out of the Ohio Valley tonight and cross southern New England on Friday bringing periods of moderate to heavy snowfall to portions of New Hampshire and southwestern Maine. The heaviest snowfall is expected to fall from Friday morning through the early evening hours. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 12 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and western Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The potential exists for snowfall rates of greater than 1 inch per hour from Friday morning through the early evening hours. Travel could be very difficult due to low visibility and snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
